RT @LiveLawIndia: “This Court makes an appeal to seniors in this profession to ensure that the stipend that is paid to their juniors is eno…

Court: This Court also takes note of the fact that many of these youngsters either do not get paid by their seniors or the salaries that are paid to them are so meagre that it barely covers the cost of living in a metropolitan city. 

#delhiHighCourt #Lawyers

Court: It is indeed very difficult for young advocates to bear expenses for the purposes of accommodation food, and travelling expenses. 

#DelhiHighCourt #Lawyers

“This Court makes an appeal to seniors in this profession to ensure that the stipend that is paid to their juniors is enough for their juniors to evade the financial stress that accompanies this profession and allows them to lead a more dignified life,” #DelhiHighCourt

Justice Banerjee: I wish all of you success, good health and happiness and shubh navratri ahead and happy Dussehra and Diwali in advance. Thank you.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: I got the help of many seniors from Mr. Pal's chambers. I am thankful to all the members of my staff who have been with me. I thank you for all the good wishes which I need very much.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: But when we were educated, law was a very neglected area of study. It was even commented upon in many law commission reports to which I would rather not refer. It was in his chambers I learnt basic law.

Justice Banerjee: I would certainly remember on this occasion, my senior, Mr. S. Pal, from whom I learnt the alphabets of law. As I have telling the lady bar members at a function this afternoon, that fortunately there has been vast improvement in quality of legal education.

Justice Banerjee: I appeal to lawyers, particularly junior lawyers, to be professional, fully ready and to assist in the process of delivery of timely justice of good quality.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: I must acknowledge the contribution of counsels in cases. When the arguments are good, the lawyers are well prepared, good judgements come.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: The SC bar is a wonderful bar- strong, independent, disciplined and also learned. I expect that the bar which is very important part of justice delivery system will strive hard to ensure that Constitutional values are upheld.
#SupremeCourt
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: I may not come to Supreme Court to perform my judicial functions but I'll be there for you. Whatever I do, the interest of judiciary will be foremost in my mind.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: There is a comment which Justice Nageshwar Rao had said - "Perhaps it would be better if tenure in SC were longer. Because one starts giving ones best after a year or so. And in case of many once they start performing, it's time to say bye".

Justice Banerjee: The only regret is that a considerable part of my tenure in SC was eaten up by COVID pandemic when the SC could not function normally for a while.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: I will be failing in my duty if I don't acknowledge court masters, my PA, PS, who have shown exemplary devotion to duty and have stayed up nights to enable me to get the judgements ready.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: I am thankful to the CJI who gave me the opportunity just before my retirement to head the constitution bench. I'm thankful to my brother and sister judges for all encouragement, love and affection I've gotten.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: Thankfully, I'll now be able to spend time with my family, friends. That apart I'm fond of reading, music and travelling. Hopefully I can travel now.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: Naturally, there are many things a judge has to give up. I have hardly been able to talk to my nieces who have come- two of them from Singapore and one of them from Calcutta. I didn't have time to talk to them till now.
#SupremeCourt
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: Becoming a judge is also a sacrifice in a sense. Because apart from being dedicated, one always has to keep in mind the principle that justice should not only be done but should manifestly be seen to have been done.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: Naturally, the fees was of that time, of 2001-2002. So when I saw the amount that I was going to get, I said "Oh my god, I've never seen this kind of money together ever in my life before"
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: Two days back when they came to make me sign my pension papers I was pleasantly surprised. Because i became a judge in 2002. By 2001 my briefs were being taken by.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: I was telling my nieces that when I had the time, i didn't have money and when I had money I didn't have time. Now I will have both because I'll be getting my pension.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: I used to say no, not because I was interested in money but because I valued my freedom. I'm happy in a way that I'm demitting the office because after 20 and a half year, I would be free again.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: I would perhaps not have accepted appointment as a judge if my father was alive. When he was alive, he wanted me to be a judge and i would say no. He said that money wasn't important and as a judge you'd be able to do something for the society.

Justice Banerjee: What is important is that one has to remain patient. If one makes the effort, then work comes.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: Mrs. Ruma Pal was leading me and we were quite excited- two women arguing the case. There have been ups in the profession. There have been times for when days together you don't get work, you feel frustrated.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: Once I got a chamber, I got a lot of encouragement, not only for my senior but also his better half who was my predecessor in my office. Justice Pal was very encouraging and we were very excited when in 1980 we got briefed in an outstation case in AP.

Justice Banerjee: It has been a long journey - 16 and a half years in bar and thereafter 20 years and 7 months on the bench. A long journey, there have been ups and downs. Getting a chamber was difficult initially.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee
Madras HC Reserves Order On Plea Against GO Permitting Unenrolled Law Graduates To Appear For Civil Judge Exam @UpasanaSajeev https://t.co/yLb36rasVv

Justice Banerjee: It would have been nice if I had been able to meet Saibaba but he probably left his mortal remains way back in 1918 when my parents hadn't been conceived.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: Incidentally, I have two sisters- one of whom passed away in 2014 and the other passed away only last month, a few days back. Justice Padma Khastagi was my mother's sister. She was my aunt, not my sister.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: He always said that law is a jealous mistress and you have to put in a lot of hard work. Maybe that made me take the decision also to join the legal profession. It was in 1985 that I joined the Calcutta HC as a newcomer, a first gen lawyer.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia

Justice Banerjee: For me coming to legal profession was a coincidence and at least one person in my family was opposed to it, that was my father because he always thought I didn't put enough efforts in my studies.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: ...Justice Ashok Mathur. I inherited the brief after Mr. Gupta left Calcutta and came to Delhi. And he will probably remember: Bahama Lorry v. American Express.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

Justice Banerjee: I could've never imagined that that one day I'll give a farewell speech here. If I have to recount incidents of my life on how I joined law- I should possibly thank Mr. Jaideep Gupta, and you must be wondering why. A reference was made to a case before...

Justice Banerjee: Whatever has been said is very encouraging. I'm thankful for that too. At the time of departure, one does feel somewhat nostalgic. And I'm reminded of that day about 35 years ago, when I first stepped in the SC as a shy junior coming to SC from Calcutta HC

Justice Indira Banerjee: I thank you for the lovely farewell that the SCBA has organised and I'm grateful to all of you that you've come in such large numbers on a day where weather is such and very little transport is available.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

CJI Lalit: We're here to say goodbye sister Banerjee, you've done exceedingly well.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

CJI Lalit: She has a calm quiet composure. Her contribution has been immense. Even today, people say that last day in CJI's court is supposed to be ceremonial and I asked her how many matters should I place- she said, "Entire Board".
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

CJI Lalit: If I may consider, I'll place three of her judgements, all Constitution bench- first one pertains to Chattisgarh rent control act, second one pertains to anticipatory bail and third judgement is hot cake, just 3 days back on if larger bench should override smaller

CJI Lalit: 20 years of judicial service, untiring, single minded- is a lot. That's the journey sister Banerjee has covered. It's not just what she has covered but how she has covered.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

CJI Lalit: At the outset I must say that the collegium always picks up the best of the lot. I know everyone of you is more interested in hearing Justice Indira rather than any of us.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee

The 'Third Professor Shamnad Basheer. Memorial Lecture' 

BY

"Unusual Situation" : Supreme Court Seeks Report From Madras HC Registry On Complaint That Order Was Modified Subsequently In Website @awstika https://t.co/suTkq6R51a

Sr Adv Milind Sathe says that as per the GR police permission would be required. 

J Dhanuka - Whatever it is... this order will have to be complied. 

Court has directed the BMC to grant permission.
https://t.co/TdKeyOyIja
Permission granted to video record the entire function.

#Breaking - Bombay High Court allows #UddhavThackeray led Shiv Sena's petition to hold Dusshera rally at Shivaji Park on October 5, 2022. 

Permision granted from 2nd- 6th

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

Order 

BMC's order refusing permission is set aside. Application by petitioner seeking permission from Oct 2-6, 2022 is allowed. 

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

Order 

The petitioner has made out a case for interference and grant of permission. 

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena
ISRO Espionage Case : Supreme Court Judge Justice KM Joseph Recuses From Hearing CBI's Challenge Against Anticipatory Bail Granted To Accused @Rintumariam https://t.co/vLw3m0QEkN

Order 

We are satisfied that in this case the BMC has abused the power by rejecting the application citing another application. 

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

Order 

Mr Chinoy assured the court that there will be no law and order situation if permission is granted. 

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

Order 

In our view BMC's order rejecting the application citing law and order is a clear abuse of process of the law.

It is not the corporation's case that in the last 7 decades there was a law and order situation. 

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

The Supreme Court Bar Association has organised a farewell function in honour of Hon'ble Ms. Justice Indira Banerjee who retires from the Supreme Court today.
#SupremeCourtOfIndia
#JusticeIndiraBanerjee https://t.co/VKEOs6xtrp

The Supreme Court on Friday said that it will list the petitions challenging the abrogation of the special status of Jammu and Kashmir under Article 370 after Dussehra vacations.
Read more: https://t.co/RenB7p8Ila
#SupremeCourt https://t.co/l0szBoql1x

The Supreme Court on Friday said that it will list the petitions challenging the abrogation of the special status of Jammu and Kashmir under Article 370 after Dussehra vacations.
Read more: https://t.co/RenB7p8avC
#SupremeCourt https://t.co/6c3ONhvO7J

Order 

Court is recording citations. 

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

Order 

The BMC was concious of the facts of rival claims .. The decision by the BMC is not a bonafide decision. 

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

Order 

During the arguments we enquired with Mr Sathe when the communication was received by BMC. He said the same day. 

On 21st itself the order was passed. Sr. Counsel didn't explain why the applications before 21st

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

Order 

The letter was issued at 18.10pm after the copy of the WP was issued. 

Court records that the same day the police wrote back.

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

Order 

This court granted circulation on 21st. 
On 21st the BMC addressed a letter to the police. 

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

Order 

We have perued the application filed by the petitioners on August 22 and 26, 2022. The applications were received by the BMC on the same day, since there was no response, petition was filed. 

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

Order

Prior to 2016, permission has been granted by the BMC to Shiv Sena to hold the Dussehra Melawa at Shivaji park. 

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

Order 

We wanted to clarify, we do not wish to go into the issue as to who is the real Shiv Sena. The matter is pending before the SC and EC. 

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena
"Has Become Infructuous": Supreme Court On Kisan Mahapanchayat Plea For Protest At Satyagraha Against Farm Laws @Rintumariam https://t.co/UAgqH00Lh2

Court records how permission was granted in 2017 after consent of the parties. 

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena
Satyendar Jain Case Transfer | 'Special Judge An Upright Officer But Circumstances Raise Apprehension of Probable Bias': Delhi Court @nupur_0111 https://t.co/tnGsnOj2X3

Order 

Mr Sathe said that on 21st the police informed the corporation that there was a chance of a law and order situation. And the BMC rightly took this into consideration while rejecting applications. 

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

Order 

In view of the past experiences and especially what happened during the Ganesh festival, Mr Sathe said the applications of both were rejected. 

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

Order 

J Dhanuka - Mr Sathe submitted there is no statutory right of the petitioners to hold such a mela. He invited our attention to earlier orders passed...

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

The court is now recording submissions of Sr Adv Aspi Chinoy for Anil Desai and of Sr Adv Milind Sathe for BMC on the main petition.

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

Court agrees with Sr Adv Chinoy's argument that Mr Sarvankar has no locus.

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

Order 

In view of the fact that application filed by the petitioners is not REJECTED on the ground that whom is the real Shiv Sena, we do not wish you go in the issue.

And Mr Sada Sarvankar's interim application is rejected.

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena
The Bench allowed Bihar Cricket Association’s AGM to be held on 25th Sept, 2022 as scheduled. However, the Bench directed the results of the election to be placed before it in a sealed cover.

Order 

In view of the fact that application filed by the petitioners is not redirected on the ground that whom is the real Shiv Sena, we do not wish you go in the issue.

And Mr Sada Sarvankar's interim application is rejected.

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

Bench* 

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

Branch is first dealing with the interim application filed by MLA Mr Sada Sarvankar opposing the petition. 

Records there are proceedings pending before various forums on the issue of who is the real Shiv Sena 

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

Order is dictated. 

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

Chinoy - This is a vase of a vested right in many ways. 

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

Chinoy - Why do I have to disclose in this petition what the history is? There is lot to be said on both sides. There are forums where this will be agitated, not here. What suppression or facts are they talking about?

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena

Sr Adv Chinoy - The GR of 2016, was specific. It doesn't mean that someone can come, and your right can be defeated. If not a right it is a legitimate expectation . 

#BombayHC #UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #ShivSena
Bench: We can say AGM can take place but any decision regarding election is subject to decision of the court.

Counsel for BCA: If everyone is unopposed then what will happen on Sunday. 

Counsel for applicant: Postpone the AGM by a week.
Counsel for applicant: My grievance was that they could not have altered the electoral college as per the amendment which is not approved by the Court.

Bench: If election is done..?

Counsel for BCA: This was unopposed. 

Bench: When was the day of balloting?

Counsel for applicant: It was on the 25th. 

Counsel for BCA: If he says election is done so what is the urgency?

Counsel for applicant: They have conducted the elections and declared results. 

Counsel for BCA: The election is on Sunday.
#SupremeCourt to hear application seeking directions to stay the upcoming election of the Bihar Cricket Association https://t.co/xKSLD2Vas1

J Dhanuka - One thing, you have also applied to another ground. 

Dwarkadas - It's in the paper but they said no in the morning. I don't know. 

Chinoy - Ofcourse it's granted. 

#BombayHC #ShivSena #UddhavThackeray
#EknathShinde

J Dhanuka - Mr Dwarkadas, you are a senior counsel of the court you should find out what should and shouldn't be argued. All of this is pending before the SC...You have not even challenged rejection of your application by the BMC
#BombayHC #ShivSena #UddhavThackeray
#EknathShinde
Is Wife Entitled To Maintenance When Decree Of Restitution Of Conjugal Rights Is Against Her? Delhi High Court Answers @nupur_0111 https://t.co/1zu48md7G0

Dwarkadas reading EC order saying something on the lines of who is the party whip and Shiv Sena symbols. 

J Dhanuka - Mr Dwarkadas, how is this relevant?? 

#BombayHC #ShivSena #UddhavThackeray
#EknathShinde

RT @LiveLawIndia: J Dhanuka to Dwarkadas- Then we will have to go into how you got permission from MMRDA. Don't invite all this. 

#BombayH…

RT @LiveLawIndia: Dwarkadas - This is only to show my locus. 

States that the EC passed an order and the SC refused to intervene. 

J Dhak…

Dwarkadas continues - The history goes back to much before the applications for permission were made. 

#BombayHC #ShivSena #UddhavThackeray
#EknathShinde

J Dhanuka to Dwarkadas- Then we will have to go into how you got permission from MMRDA. Don't invite all this. 

#BombayHC #ShivSena #UddhavThackeray
#EknathShinde
Watchmen In Aided Private Ashram Schools Entitled To Equal Pay Scale As Those In Govt Ashram Schools: Bombay High Court https://t.co/SmNwCQsaj7

Dwarkadas - This is only to show my locus. 

States that the EC passed an order and the SC refused to intervene. 

J Dhakuna - Let us tell you very clearly, we are not going to say anything about the proceedings pending before the SC and EC.

#BombayHC #ShivSena #UddhavThackeray

Dwarkadas - The loyalty of a person and his allegiance to a party cannot be gauged this way. You are pitching me against my own party. See the contradictions. Where does Mr Desai get the right that he has a higher right than me? 

#ShivSena #BombayHC

Dwarkadas - I am a member of this political party. I am not an outsider
I am showing a greater allegiance. 

How can they say "Mr Sarvankar" left the Shiv Sena. This is all Mr Desai's imagination. 

#BombayHC #ShivSena #UddhavThackeray
#EknathShinde

Dwarkadas - I am a member of this political party. I am not an outsider
I am showing a greater allegiance. 

How can they say "Mr Sarvankar" left the Shiv Sena. This is all Mr Desai's imagination. 

#BombayHC #ShivSena #UddhavThackeray
#EknathShinde

Dwarkadas - I will show the difference between registered political party and recognised political party. 

#BombayHC #ShivSena #UddhavThackeray
#EknathShinde

Dwarkadas -  Mr Desai should know that his government has lost the election. It is not the govt. of Mr. Uddhav Thackeray that is ruling the state.

#BombayHC #ShivSena #UddhavThackeray
#EknathShinde

Dwarkadas - If Shiv Sena, THE PARTY, as MR Desai claims it. I am not trying to drag other issues between the parties. My compilation was dismissed as if it is irrelevant that orders of the SC were ignored. 

#UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #BombayHighCourt #ShivSena

Dwarkadas - I could have understood if there was no history to the petition. Those are not the circumstances unless the court has to wear blinkers. 

#UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #BombayHighCourt #ShivSena

Dwarkadas reads out portions where Desai asserts himself as the secretary of Shiv Sena, a registered political party. 

And that the Dusshera rally is a tradition of the party. 

#UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #BombayHighCourt #ShivSena
S.357A CrPC | Magistrate & Sessions Judge Should Recommend In Judgment Whether There Is Need For Compensation To Rehabilitate Victim: Karnataka HC @plumbermushi https://t.co/tWpOpyYAgd

Sr Adv Dwarkadar -The petitioner says my intervention shouldn't even be considered. 

Kindly see the cause title. What does it say? It says 'The Shiv Sena' a registered political party

#UddhavThackeray #EknathShinde #BombayHighCourt #ShivSena
